overview: Ella's paranoia of losing Chuck has led her to spin scenarios in her head, that feel so real, she sometimes forgets what is actuality and what is imagination. This short film tries to capture the angst attached to many women's and men's dilemmas within relationships by telling the story of one night in two versions in the lives of Ella and Chuck. Will jealousy and mistrust ruin them? Does Chuck have just the same fears Ella? Or is it all a dream?
title: Ella
